languageKey.label: General Topic associated with a sermon or series.
A topic is a general categorization given to sermons or series, which helps identify its content further.
The language of this topic.
This should be the default language unless this topic represents a translation of another language.
Hides this record from front end display.
This checkbox will hide or unhide a topic from the users of your site. You can use this to temporarily hide this record from the Front End while editing it in the Back End.
tx_wecsermons_topics:islinked
Enables or disables linking to the single view of this record on the Front End.
This checkbox allows you to have a topic entered into the SMS and displayed on the Front End, but disallow users to view the topics detail page by disabling the link to its single view.
tx_wecsermons_topics:hidden
The title of the topic.
The title is the name you associate with this topic.
Description of this topic.
The description is a brief summary of the topic.
